full_threads.body:
Thanks Rica,

For Product and charger tile, when the folder initially downloads, can it please say Product images - currently says Stride product images. Then when they click on Product images folder that has loaded, it opens with the two folders under it just like how the Posters folder has been set up.

Can we please align the download buttons:





Thank you,

Christine

full_threads.body:
Thanks Nikki!



Hi team,



Instead of creating a new tile for those mentioned below, please just add the folder with that name to the existing tile, so that it's consistent with the new layout.



Under Point of sale, poster tile, add below folder and name it Stride Posters (instead of Under the 'Point of sale' category, create a new tile titled 'Stride Posters' and the files to it)





Under Website and social media, add below folder to relevant tile and name the folder Stride social media (instead of Under the 'Website and social media' category, add a new tile titled 'Stride social media' and add files to it)





Please do the same as above to the below:



Create a new tile titled 'Stride product' and add these files to it:







Thank you,

Christine

Hi Guys,



Can you please create the following categories and add the assets below. There are a couple of bits and pieces yet to come.

Please let me know if any of the instructions below require further clarification.



Assets are all here:

Vivante Stride LAM Assets



BRIEF



Under the 'Images' category add:



The files to this tile:





Add: to this tile below.

Also, update the cover image to one of the images from the folder.





Add to this tile:





Add to this tile:







Create a new tile titled 'Stride product' and add these files to it:







Under the 'Point of sale' category, create a new tile titled 'Stride Posters' and the files to it:







Under the 'Website and social media' category, add a new tile titled 'Stride social media' and add files to it:







Under the 'Local marketing' category:


  1. add the files to the tile below.





  1. Change the name of the above tile to 'Database letters'

  2. Update the image of the above tile to this one:









  1. Move the files contained in these two tiles (below) to the above tile titled 'Database letters' and retire the two tiles:






Regards,

Nikki

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,


Hope you had a lovely weekend!


Unitron's next launch will be on 11 Nov 2024.


Can you please start a test site for this for review - items attached as per below:


Vivante image on home page to be updated to: UH_Packshot_Vivante-4RICs-4BTEs-CMYK_15300x7850.png

Please refer to the spreadsheet attached - those highlighted in green are the files attached to this email.
Please take note of the comments in column B.


Nikki will be sending you items for upload to the this test site too.


Thank you,
Christine
